commit.message:
DataInputStream.java (readChar): Use readFully.

	* java/io/DataInputStream.java (readChar): Use readFully.
	(readInt): Likewise.
	(readLong): Likewise.
	(readShort): Likewise.
	(readUnsignedShort): Likewise.

From-SVN: r45834

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,11 @@

+
+	* java/io/DataInputStream.java (readChar): Use readFully.
+	(readInt): Likewise.
+	(readLong): Likewise.
+	(readShort): Likewise.
+	(readUnsignedShort): Likewise.
+
